file_content.text: Be safe, Master. May the Force guide you.
Please go safely, I cannot stand another loss.
I have warned you enough. Stay back! I will not allow more lives to be lost!
As I told you, we're--oh, Jedi. Can you talk to him?
We are friends. Remember, a Jedi listens first, and strikes only if necessary.
Be at peace.
We've come to retake the walker factory, and the other Guardian Holds.
They are allies, as am I.
Then it's true? I'm so sorry, Master. I feel like I can't trust anyone, even one of my own people.
So these people are with you, Master? I couldn't quite believe it, not after today.
Save your suspicion and recklessness for the enemy.
Don't be a fool.
I beg your pardon. I must be cautious now, even among my own people.
I beg your pardon, Master. After today, I can't trust anyone.
Must choose all fellows carefully now.
Yes. We quite understand.
Oh, we're right there with you.
Should never be too trusting.
It hasn't been a good day for any of us.
I am Jari Orez. We're all that's left of the defenders. Like Aelan says, we can... never...
The Council entrusted Guardian Hold Six to me and... my friend, Aelan Kalder. Just another battle together, we said. And it was, at first.
Go on when you're ready.
Take your time.
Thank you, Master.
Something changed?
Hurry this up.
Aelan and I were checking the sentries, just talking, when he... attacked me. Not with his blaster, with the Force. Like a Sith.
When I could stand again, he was killing our soldiers. I tried to stop him.
Now Guardian Hold Six belongs to the Empire. How could Aelan do this? Even as we dueled, I felt no darkness, nothing!
It's not your fault. Aelan was a sleeper agent placed by the Sith.
He's a Child of the Emperor.
I didn't think this situation could be any worse.
Please, I must know what the current situation is.
Concentrate. I need your help.
Stop this. You are a Jedi, conduct yourself like one.
Enough hysterics.
I apologize, Master. I've learned a little more since... since then.
The Imperials occupy the main factory. They're making military walkers; building their own reinforcements.
We must shut down the production line. But Guardian Hold Six is a fortress, with no way inside.
You escaped, with many wounded. How?
In the fighting, a wall junction exploded and overloaded the security grid. But the junction will be repaired by now.
If the wall itself was damaged in the blast, it could be breached.
Could we get through the wall?
A precise hit could knock the security grid out for good.
Then we disrupt it again.
We cannot, not from the outside. But the wall itself. That may be vulnerable.
Those walkers are the biggest threat, the Imperials could start sending them across the city.
We must focus on the walkers.
However many we destroy, they can always build more. But... perhaps that wall was damaged in the explosion.
Yes. Your forces could break through the wall, and distract the walkers. Then you could slip in and stop production. But, your soldiers will suffer heavy losses.
Any loss is a tragedy. But this is the only way.
I know, and I regret it.
The sooner I stop the walker production lines, the safer they will be.
Then I'll work quickly.
Shrinking from your duty is a sure way to be defeated.
People suffer in wartime.
I apologize, Master.
Our soldiers breach wall, draw off the walkers. You enter through the breach, turn off factory production line.
Who do you want to send? Our droids are ready; the Esh-kha and Voss commandos are too.
I imagine Balmorra's droids know what to do with walkers.
The droids would be perfect.
Indeed. They'll crack the wall for you, then take those walkers apart.
Here are the codes to shut down the production line. And, Master, Aelan is still somewhere inside.
Please. If you find him, try to help him. May the Force be with you both.
Gaden-Ko, have your commandos keep those walkers away from the factory.
Dispatch the Voss commandos.
It is our duty. First, the wall.
Hallow Voice, your people can handle the walkers for a time.
Send the Esh-kha.
When the wall is a door, broken steel shall rain. If we fall, we fall well.
